title: I lost LP for during a remake???
body:
https://scontent-iad3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t35.0-12/13579820_1071471346276481_459429818_o.png?oh=592d85053b0539a8ed94cf6ef671dffa&oe=577FF5D1

Wtf I lost LP for no reason???
If you look on the enemy team, Sona was AFK, LV1, No Items, but it says for some reason that I lost LP and that my team did a remake even though the enemy team did??? I'm even lv2 in the game!!!

replies.body: I took a look into this for you, and it looks like you were marked as a leaver which then prompted the /remake.  I was unable to find any issues or any other players who were marked for afk.  As a heads up, it's important to stay committed to the match even if someone afks.  You never know if that player might return or if /remake is denied, so it's important to stay prepared!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=YiqGut0X,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-07T17:56:37.412+0000)
>
> I took a look into this for you, and it looks like you were marked as a leaver which then prompted the /remake.  I was unable to find any issues or any other players who were marked for afk.  As a heads up, it's important to stay committed to the match even if someone afks.  You never know if that player might return or if /remake is denied, so it's important to stay prepared!

Is it not possible that this was a bug? Not to argue with Riot but it looked like Sona was the reason for the remake, it wasn't even his team that prompted the remake and he was penalized for it.

The penalty is not necessarily only for a single person. The way the remake works is anyone who is disconnected/flagged as AFK when a game is remade will receive a penalty, and from the looks of this post, this includes people who are AFK and weren't on the team that remade the game.

It's likely this way due to reasons that Porocles stated. You never know if the disconnected player will return or even if the remake vote fails. This is why it's important to continue playing even if you think a game might be remade.

I don't know if Riot intended you to receive a penalty even if you weren't on the team that remade the game, but that is currently the way it works.
